content: while i don t much like christmas as a holiday i do love the decorations going up everywhere during advent all the lights when i was knitting these socks they reminded me of the big fancy fairylights hung up in shopping streets stars comets reindeer those big lights hanging across the streets and swaying in the wind gauge 36 stitches/10cm in stockinette on smaller needles materials approx 50g 60g of mc yarn white approx 30g of cc yarn red 2 5mm dpns or needles for magic loop or size required to get gauge 2mm dpns or needles for magic loop or size required to get gauge tapestry needle the pattern is written for knitting on a set of five dpns but can easily be adjusted to your favourite style of knitting socks sizes sizes s m l xl with a stitch count of 56 64 72 80 in the stockinette part the foot circumference at the suggested gauge is 15 5cm 17 75cm 20cm 22 25cm length can easily adjusted in the stockinette part
